name: Nervos.Land
description:
Nervos.land is an alpha version of the blockchain-game village simulator using NervosNetwork Godwoken Layer 2.

Web3 functionalities:

  • Minting NFT characters
  • Transfering NFT in/out of the game
  • Own ERC20 token - Nervos Land Token ($NLT)

If you're nebiew on web3 games, please watch this video first:


Important note for Godwoken:

Please take $CKB L1 address here and use Faucet to claim some tokens, then please use https://testnet.bridge.godwoken.io to deposit $CKB in L2 Testnet. You can use the in-game faucet by clicking on the button on the left angle "Deposit NLT" for receiving some $NLT. It is used for mint NFT characters.  Also, if you got stuck in some moment refresh page using shift-f5 to reload cache.
